channel.title: I need help editing
channel.description:
Can anyone plz hlp me i need to know how to edit the game to make... monster spawns, to make shops sell certain things make you spawn with certain items and make members area and skills work
also if anyone knows how to add commands so when you type them in it will give you certain items... ie in hellscape you can put in ::leet and it gives you pking items or ::barrows and you gat all barrows sets...[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 02:23:05 PM[/size][hr]I got monster spawns good... [br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 02:25:51 PM[/size][hr]help would be nice...[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 03:01:53 PM[/size][hr]if anyone knows how to make codes to generate more than one item.. plz post or something...

item.title: I need help editing

item.description:

Can anyone plz hlp me i need to know how to edit the game to make…
monster spawns,
to make shops sell certain things
make you spawn with certain items
and make members area and skills work
